comments:
description:
NPE thrown out when new a data source after insert a chart to library

steps to reproduce:
1.drag a chart to library
2.click ok to close chart builder
3.set chart name to be "chart1" in property editor
4.new a data source

actual result:
NPE thrown out

expected result:
No exception thrown out
